=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eqoba Hair Straightener Detangling Hair Brush Hair Straightening Irons Ceramic Aniti-Scald Comb LCD Display Pink
Review Date: 2016/07/01
Store: Eqoba
Product Description: ['Specifications:Rated Voltage: 110-220VRated Power: 75WFrequency: 50-60HzWire length: About 84.6"Recommended Temperatures:For thicker hair, use 210-230°C /410-445°FFor normal hair, use 190-210°C /375-410°FFor thinner hair, use 170-200°C /340-375°FAdvantages:•Silicone keypad that is durable•360 degree rotatable wire prevents tangles•Includes digital LCD operating display screen•Brush body is made out of high-temperature resistant plastic that is designed from the United States•Ingenious combination of hair straightener and brush, with a 3 in1 function: ceramic iron straightener + detangling brush + anion hair massager•The EQOBA hair straightener\'s heated brush is healthier for your hair. Firstly, when the comb plate reaches 200 °C(392°F), the exterior is only50°C(122°F)so that you will not burn your skin. Secondly, it produces anion when in use which removes frizz and also massages your scalp. Also, anion can combine with air to produce moisture that can help nourish your hairWarnings:1. Please check the condition of the product body and cord before use; don\'t use if there is any damage2. This brush has Auto Shut-Off Protection, it will shut down automatically every half an hour, please restart it if you want to use it again.3. Keep out of reach of children4. Keep away from flammable materials5. Wait until cool before storing the product6. Highest set temperature allowed is 230°C (446°F).However, it is highly recommended that you don\'t use the maximum set temperature over a long period of time as this may damage your hair. Once you are finished using, please pullout the electric plug7. You can use it when your hair is dry or semi dryPackage Includes:1 x Hair Straightener1 x Product Instructions2 x Hair Clips']
Average Rating: 2.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '12.5 x 4.5 x 2.5 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'B16010013-01', 'UPC': '889517151890'}

Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has experienced several positive interactions with various products. High ratings were given to items that emphasized effectiveness and usability. Noteworthy is the satisfaction from using the makeup cleaner, praised for its ease of use and cleaning capabilities. The user also appreciated the versatility and efficiency of a hair styling tool, finding it perfect for long hair. Products such as the under-eye masks were highlighted for their revitalizing effects, making the user feel refreshed and reducing the appearance of tiredness. Additionally, the storage organizer was noted for its practical design and function, performing its intended role well.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
However, the user's experience was not devoid of issues. Certain products garnered lower ratings due to specific complaints. Flaking was a concern with one primer, detracting from its otherwise intended benefits. Another item, while easy to use, still received criticism, hinting at potential shortcomings in overall performance or satisfaction. The average ratings suggest inconsistent experiences across some purchases, pointing to areas demanding improvement.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
In summary, the user's shopping behavior reflects a blend of positive and negative experiences. Many products were recognized for their effectiveness and ease of use, resulting in high satisfaction. Still, there were noticeable shortcomings in certain items, prompting the user to express discontent. This combination indicates a nuanced shopping journey, marked by reliable products alongside a few disappointments that warrant closer evaluation.

features: THE PERFECT GIFT— Our latest statement piece offers a beautiful silhouette that was carefully handmade by our in-house designers with the intention to create a long lasting, beautiful gift for her.

FALL IN LOVE— Great jewelry ornaments to wear for parties and family gatherings; Makes a wonderful gift for your loved ones on special occassions. These lovely statement pieces are perfect for wearing to the an event or showing your love for latest trendy fashion look

GREAT VALUE— Enjoy high-end quality, gorgeous jewelry at a low price point. All our beautiful jewelry is Lead & Nickel compliant with all U.S. requirements, lovingly packaged and delivered state-wide.
LUX ACCESSORIES— A world leader in fashion accessories. Our designs are like a lover at your side all the time. Read our reviews! Made with quality materials for a beautiful long lasting gift.
RISK FREE SHOPPING— We offer a 30-day satisfaction money back guarantee. Any problem with your purchase, message us for a quick replacement.
description: L U X A C C E S S O R I E S

LUX is conceptualized and designed by a small team located in the heart of New York City and manufactured in China, continuing the brands' notoriety in the jewelry world for over two decades. At LUX we strive to create unique and inspiring pieces that range from everyday wearable items to the sometimes outrageous.
✔ Don't Like It? Return It For 100% Money Back Guarantee
Renowned for our high quality from using only the finest materials and craftsmanship. We take a hit on the cost to ensure that careful attention has been paid for all of our products.
Starting 2020, receive up to 25% off bulk orders!
